<The Elihu Benjamin Washburne House
1:
--------------------
Text: Elihu Benjamin Washburne House:  Constructed in 1844–45, the building was built for and owned by Elihu Benjamin Washburne, a prominent Galena lawyer who served in Congress during the American Civil War, and as Secretary of State and Minister to France under President Ulysses S. Grant, another famous Galenian.
Triplets:<Elihu Benjamin Washburne
